title: Navigation of the ITSI Service Analyzer tree view
description: we don't use description, I wonder where this shows up?
background: This is a bunch of background information about the question. This will set up the scenario and what you are looking for, and might hint at the question or what they would have to do to answer. Maybe also hint at the level of difficulty for the question.
learning_objective: what we want them to learn

phrasings.question_phrasing: ITSI can incorporate business and non-infrastructure related KPI's so you can see how technical services impact business performance. What is the name of the ITSI service used to determine if customers of the StreamR Service are happy?
phrasings.learning_objective: what we want them to learn

hints.hint: Nudge - What part of ITSI shows all of the services that are active?
Bump - Try following the Tree View
Spoiler - If you follow the Service Dependency Tree For SRVR to STREAMR, which service is customer focused?

phrasings.question_phrasing: ITSI can incorporate business and non-infrastructure related KPI's so you can see how technical services impact business perforamnce. What are the business KPIs being used to determine customer experience?

answers.answer: Twitter Sentiment, Customer Support Cases, Customer Churn, # Active Users
Twitter Sentiment, Customer Support Cases, Customer Churn, Number Active Users

hints.hint: Nudge - What part of ITSI shows all of the services that are active?
Bump - Try following the Tree View
Spoiler - If you follow the Service Dependency Tree For SRVR to STREAMR, which service is customer focused?

title: Associating Entities with KPI Performance
description: we don't use description, I wonder where this shows up?
background: This is a bunch of background information about the question. This will set up the scenario and what you are looking for, and might hint at the question or what they would have to do to answer. Maybe also hint at the level of difficulty for the question.

phrasings.question_phrasing: The current outage appears to only be affecting a subset of customers trying to access specific content. What are the cloud regions being impacted by the outage
phrasings.answer_guidance: List the regions, in any order, all lower case

hints.hint: Nudge - What happens when you click on the red services in the Service Analyzer?
Spoiler - It looks like only some of these services have entities

phrasings.question_phrasing: What services within Video Delivery are in static locations within the cloud?
phrasings.answer_guidance: List the services in any order

answers.answer: GCP Edge Cache, GCP Cloud Storage
GCP Cloud Storage, GCP Edge Cache

hints.hint: Nudge - What happens when you click on the red services in the Service Analyzer?
Spoiler - It looks like only some of these services have entities

title: Using Episode Review
description: we don't use description, I wonder where this shows up?
background: This is a bunch of background information about the question. This will set up the scenario and what you are looking for, and might hint at the question or what they would have to do to answer. Maybe also hint at the level of difficulty for the question.

phrasings.question_phrasing: The ITSI episode for this outage contains notable events from several sources indicating a larger issue. What is the name of the notable event that is flagged as the root cause of the episode?
phrasings.answer_guidance: Event name (copy/paste it into the answer)

answers.answer: SignalFX Detector - Cloud Function Duration Exceeding SLA

hints.hint: Nudge - What area of the Episode that shows the individual notable events?
Bump - Notable Events are added to an episode based on time and other dimensions. What shows the time of events in the Episode?
Spoiler - Events Timeline

title: Using SignalFX/Metrics
description: we don't use description, I wonder where this shows up?
background: This is a bunch of background information about the question. This will set up the scenario and what you are looking for, and might hint at the question or what they would have to do to answer. Maybe also hint at the level of difficulty for the question.

phrasings.question_phrasing: StreamR is using Cloud Functions as a serverless infrastructure to support streaming to individual devices, which can be executed without static infrastructure to support. What is the name of the Function with the longest duration?

hints.hint: Bump - Try using the "Explore in SignalFX" alert action in the episode from the last question
Bump - Duration is a metric data source and not an event, try searching in the srvr_metrics index
Spoiler - Use the Google Cloud Functions Overview Dashboard in SignalFX, or the Analytics Workspace in Core Splunk to look at function.duration by function

phrasings.question_phrasing: The Splunk Add-on for GCP Allows for the collection of Cloud Monitoring data from Stackdriver and the GCP Monitoring API into a Splunk instance. Knowing that this is in your environment, What is the name of the Cloud Function with the longest duration?

hints.hint: Bump - Try using the "Explore in SignalFX" alert action in the episode from the last question
Bump - Duration is a metric data source and not an event, try searching in the srvr_metrics index
Spoiler - Use the Google Cloud Functions Overview Dashboard in SignalFX, or the Analytics Workspace in Core Splunk to look at function.duration by function
